trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the target of a <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> is inside or outside the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o destino de um <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship" /> está dentro ou fora do <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.

trans-unit.source: If the target is inside the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (Internal), the relationship <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> is always a relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Se o destino estiver dentro de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (interna), a relação <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> sempre é relativo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If the target is outside the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> (External), the relationship <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> can be either relative to the current location of the package or an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Se o destino estiver fora de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> (externo), a relação <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.TargetUri%2A> pode ser um absoluto ou relativo para o local atual do pacote [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The relationship references a resource that is external to the package.
trans-unit.target: A relação referencia um recurso externo ao pacote.

trans-unit.source: The relationship references a part that is inside the package.
trans-unit.target: A relação referencia uma parte que está dentro do pacote.
